md:
giải nghĩa từ "brushing" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Brushing (verb) : Đánh, chải, quét
	+ Meaning: To move a brush or a broom over a surface to clean or remove dirt, dust, or other unwanted substances.
	+ Example sentence: "She spent hours brushing the floor to get rid of the stubborn stains."
	+ Related words: brush, broom, sweep, clean, dust
	+ Antonyms: dirty, messy, unclean

* Brushing (noun) : Đánh, chải, quét
	+ Meaning: The act of moving a brush or a broom over a surface to clean or remove dirt, dust, or other unwanted substances.
	+ Example sentence: "The brushing of the floor was a tedious task, but it had to be done."
	+ Related words: brush, broom, sweep, clean, dust
	+ Antonyms: dirty, messy, unclean

* Brushing (verb) : Chải, đánh, vuốt
	+ Meaning: To smooth or arrange hair, fur, or fibers using a brush.
	+ Example sentence: "She spent hours brushing her hair to get it to look perfect for the wedding."
	+ Related words: brush, comb, hair, fur, smooth
	+ Antonyms: tangled, messy, uncombed

* Brushing (verb) : Đánh, chạm, va
	+ Meaning: To touch or strike something lightly, often in a gentle or casual manner.
	+ Example sentence: "The branches of the trees were brushing against the windows, making a soft creaking sound."
	+ Related words: touch, strike, gentle, casual, soft
	+ Antonyms: hard, rough, violent
html:
giải nghĩa từ "brushing" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • Brushing (verb) : Đánh, chải, quét

    • Meaning: To move a brush or a broom over a surface to clean or remove dirt, dust, or other unwanted substances.
    • Example sentence: "She spent hours brushing the floor to get rid of the stubborn stains."
    • Related words: brush, broom, sweep, clean, dust
    • Antonyms: dirty, messy, unclean

  • Brushing (noun) : Đánh, chải, quét

    • Meaning: The act of moving a brush or a broom over a surface to clean or remove dirt, dust, or other unwanted substances.
    • Example sentence: "The brushing of the floor was a tedious task, but it had to be done."
    • Related words: brush, broom, sweep, clean, dust
    • Antonyms: dirty, messy, unclean

  • Brushing (verb) : Chải, đánh, vuốt

    • Meaning: To smooth or arrange hair, fur, or fibers using a brush.
    • Example sentence: "She spent hours brushing her hair to get it to look perfect for the wedding."
    • Related words: brush, comb, hair, fur, smooth
    • Antonyms: tangled, messy, uncombed

  • Brushing (verb) : Đánh, chạm, va

    • Meaning: To touch or strike something lightly, often in a gentle or casual manner.
    • Example sentence: "The branches of the trees were brushing against the windows, making a soft creaking sound."
    • Related words: touch, strike, gentle, casual, soft
    • Antonyms: hard, rough, violent
